title: 写着这些是不是成功了？建服
author: sdokdyg5656
txt_content:
[INFO] Starting minecraft server version Beta 1.3
[INFO] Loading properties
[INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[WARNING] **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!

replies.author: sdokdyg5656
replies.txt_content: 那怎么打不开我ip地址游戏

replies.author: sunkinds
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 sunkinds 于 2011-2-27 21:56 编辑 

[INFO] Done (700171600ns)! For help, type "help" or "?"

好像不是?而是OK才行?

你进入自己的服务器并不需要输入自己的IP
而是输入一句英文..好吧,那句英文我忘了.
下面那位说,进入自己建的服务器的IP英文是 localhost 

719823597  localhost  [color=rgb(153, 153, 153) !important]发表于 9 分钟前

replies.author: sdokdyg5656
replies.txt_content: 你是说在自己的游戏存档里打上localhost 吗？（怎么打）
